item.title: Install R
item.description: Scope In this section, we provide information and advice to install R for the purpose of developing a Bioconductor package. This section does not seek to provide a comprehensive workflow through the installation of R, as the details will depend on your individual operating system and configuration. Instead, this section includes links to key resources and sources of information. Which version of R? The Bioconductor developer guidelines state: Package authors should develop against the version of R that will be available to users when the Bioconductor devel branch becomes the Bioconductor release branch.

item.title: Initialize an R package skeleton
item.description: Create a new package skeleton From the usethis::create_tidy_package documentation. Creates a new package, immediately applies as many of the tidyverse conventions as possible, issues a few reminders, and activates the new package. usethis::create_tidy_package("~/biocpkg")
